title: Lost Skin
body:
Hello Admin. 

I really love playing League of legends. On July 8 2017, i purchased Yasuo's Skin the Project YAsuo. However today, as i logged , I cannot use the skin anymore. I purchased the skin using my RP points. I don't what happened why it is lost.

Please help me in this.

Hoping i will hear any of your team soon. 

Donald aka Punkhazard

replies.body: I went ahead and looked over your account for you, and I saw where you bought the Project Yasuo skin a few days ago but it looks like there was a refund used on that skin the next day. If that wasn't you who refunded it, hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap to make sure your account is still secure. No worries, if someone else had refunded that skin we'll be able to get it back for you as well ^_^!

Hello!!

Thank you so much for your time.

I checked my Bank account today and, I only saw a debit in.

So, I sent a ticket. Hope I can find help about my issue.

Thanks.
